item.title: Could i get a TuT to help me switch to ancients by an Altar
item.dc:creator: @nemo296 nemo296
item.description:
@nemo296 wrote:

Here you go

Search for this

ReplaceObject(objectX, (objectY - 1), -1, -1);

if it come up then it should say

case 2213: //Bank Booth skillX = objectX; skillY = objectY; NpcWanneTalk = 2; break;

Under that add this Case

case 6552: { //Ancient magic altar (temp !!!) if (GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 1) == true) { if (playerAncientMagics == true) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = false; ancients = 0; } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); ancients = 1; playerAncientMagics = true; } } } break;

Ps. its kinda messy

item.title: Could i get a TuT to help me switch to ancients by an Altar
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Add a alter in your client. Then when you add it, it should have an item id. Use this case.

case (ObjectID) if (ancients == 0) { ancients = 1; setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); ancients = 0; }
